title: Eating Out Back On The Menu? (with Apsana Begum MP)
itunes:title: Eating Out Back On The Menu? (with Apsana Begum MP)
description:
Boris Johnson meets senior ministers to discuss relaxing social distancing rules in England.

Apsana Begum, Labour MP for Poplar and Limehouse, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing how she wants the government to address the disproportionate number of Covid-19 deaths among BAME people.

Plus, Professor Karol Sikora, former director of the WHO Cancer Programme, outlines the scale of the impact the lockdown has had on cancer treatments.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
